About Me

Hey! I'm a Software Engineer based out of Hyderabad and currently working at EPAM Systems as a Lead Software Engineer. I've been playing around with softwares and building applications from almost a decade now. I mostly code in Python and work on backend engineering projects. I've been working on domains like healthcare, ad-tech, infrastructure & automation. I've great inclination towards Infrastructure & SRE domain which is why I love playing around with tools like docker, jenkins & gitlab-ci. I'm also a co-organizer of some of the open source communities in Hyderabad like HydPy & DSUGHyd.

Skills

Backend

Python, Django, Flask, Redis, Celery, MySql, Mongo, NodeJs

Frontend

JavaScript, ReactJS(Novice), HTML and JQuery

DevOps

Docker, Jenkins, Gitlab-CI, Git, Gitlab, Ansible(Novice)
